mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN g.sub_id IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(r.id,'-',g.sub_id) ELSE r.id END AS pk,r.id AS relate_id,r.code,r.parent_id,r.report_type,g.is_score,g.score_max,g.sub_id,a.process_mode,a.dict_id,a.grade FROM information_title_relate r INNER JOIN information_grade g ON r.id = g.title_relate_id LEFT JOIN information_grade_auto a ON a.title_relate_id = r.id WHERE 1=1 and r.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
